description: Retrieves a list of training plans for the current account.

parameters.name: Filters
parameters.description: Additional filters to apply to the list of training plans. (dict) --- A filter to apply when listing or searching for training plans. For more information about how to reserve GPU capacity for your SageMaker HyperPod clusters using Amazon SageMaker Training Plan, see ``CreateTrainingPlan ``. The name of the filter field (e.g., Status, InstanceType). The value to filter by for the specified field.

nested_params.name: Name
nested_params.description: The name of the filter field (e.g., Status, InstanceType).

nested_params.name: Value
nested_params.description: The value to filter by for the specified field.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: A token to continue pagination if more results are available.

nested_items.name: TrainingPlanSummaries
nested_items.description: A list of summary information for the training plans.

nested_items.name: TrainingPlanArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN); of the training plan.

nested_items.name: TrainingPlanName
nested_items.description: The name of the training plan.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: The current status of the training plan (e.g., Pending, Active, Expired). To see the complete list of status values available for a training plan, refer to the Status attribute within the TrainingPlanSummary object.

nested_items.name: StatusMessage
nested_items.description: A message providing additional information about the current status of the training plan.

nested_items.name: DurationHours
nested_items.description: The number of whole hours in the total duration for this training plan.

nested_items.name: DurationMinutes
nested_items.description: The additional minutes beyond whole hours in the total duration for this training plan.

nested_items.name: StartTime
nested_items.description: The start time of the training plan.

nested_items.name: EndTime
nested_items.description: The end time of the training plan.

nested_items.name: UpfrontFee
nested_items.description: The upfront fee for the training plan.

nested_items.name: CurrencyCode
nested_items.description: The currency code for the upfront fee (e.g., USD).

nested_items.name: TotalInstanceCount
nested_items.description: The total number of instances reserved in this training plan.

nested_items.name: AvailableInstanceCount
nested_items.description: The number of instances currently available for use in this training plan.

nested_items.name: InUseInstanceCount
nested_items.description: The number of instances currently in use from this training plan.

nested_items.name: TargetResources
nested_items.description: The target resources (e.g., training jobs, HyperPod clusters) that can use this training plan.
A training plan designed for SageMaker training jobs can only be used to schedule and run training jobs.
A training plan for HyperPod clusters can be used exclusively to provide compute resources to a cluster's instance group.

nested_items.name: ReservedCapacitySummaries
nested_items.description: A list of reserved capacities associated with this training plan, including details such as instance types, counts, and availability zones.

nested_items.name: ReservedCapacityArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN); of the reserved capacity.

nested_items.name: InstanceType
nested_items.description: The instance type for the reserved capacity.

nested_items.name: TotalInstanceCount
nested_items.description: The total number of instances in the reserved capacity.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: The current status of the reserved capacity.

nested_items.name: AvailabilityZone
nested_items.description: The availability zone for the reserved capacity.

nested_items.name: DurationHours
nested_items.description: The number of whole hours in the total duration for this reserved capacity.

nested_items.name: DurationMinutes
nested_items.description: The additional minutes beyond whole hours in the total duration for this reserved capacity.

nested_items.name: StartTime
nested_items.description: The start time of the reserved capacity.

nested_items.name: EndTime
nested_items.description: The end time of the reserved capacity.
